description.value:
Primary Energy: Space 2 (force push/pull) Supporting Energy: Space 1 (close range) Range: Close, 30 ft. Duration: Instantaneous Total Cost: 3 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery Effect: Push or pull one creature/object up to 10 feet. Target makes [[/save type=fortitude]] to resist (if creature). Can also be used to knock prone ([[/save type=reflex]]). Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. Saving Throw: Fortitude (to resist forced movement) or Reflex (to avoid being knocked prone) Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = 5 feet, 2 = 10 feet, 3 = 15 feet, 4 = 20 feet or knock prone

---
